name: NewZealandNHIIG
title: New Zealand NHI IG
description: The FHIRb  API for the NHI

resource.name: NHI Address
resource.description: Adds additional, NHI specific extensions

resource.name: NHI Patient
resource.description: The Patient resource exposed by the NHI.

resource.name: NZ Address
resource.description: Adds 'suburb' to Address for use within New Zealand

resource.name: Address_isPrimary
resource.description: Indicates this is the primary residential address - each patient must have one and only one

resource.name: BuildingName
resource.description: No description

resource.name: Dhb
resource.description: The District Health Board the patient resides in. It is derived from the patient's primary residential address. Not updated directly.

resource.name: Ethnicity
resource.description: The ethnicity of the patient. Currently using level 4 codes.

resource.name: Informationsource
resource.description: The source of the information

resource.name: NotValidatedReason
resource.description: The reason why the address has not been validated

resource.name: Patient_addressDerived
resource.description: Additional address elements exposed by the NHI and calculated from the address using the eSAM address service

resource.name: Patient_citizenship
resource.description: New Zealand citizenship

resource.name: Patient_countryOfBirth
resource.description: The country where the person was born

resource.name: Suburb
resource.description: The suburb of the address. This is not the same as 'district' or 'state.

resource.name: Address Not Validated reason
resource.description: The reason why the address was not validated

resource.name: BirthDate Information source
resource.description: The source of data for date of birth

resource.name: Country Information source
resource.description: The source of data for country of birth data

resource.name: dhb
resource.description: New Zealand DHBs

resource.name: DeathDate Information source
resource.description: The source of data for the date of death

resource.name: Domicilecode
resource.description: New Zealand Domicile codes

resource.name: Patient ethnicity
resource.description: Level 4 ethnicity codes

resource.name: Information source
resource.description: The source of this data

resource.name: Name Information source
resource.description: The source of data for name

resource.name: Patient citizenship status
resource.description: Status of citizenship in NZ

resource.name: Address Not Validated reason
resource.description: The reason why the address was not validated

resource.name: dhb
resource.description: New Zealand DHBs

resource.name: Domicilecode
resource.description: New Zealand Domicile codes

resource.name: Level 4 ethnicity codes
resource.description: Level 4 ethnicity codes

resource.name: Information source
resource.description: The codesystem used to indivate where data has been soruced from. The ValueSets for recording source of Name, birthDate, date of death and country of birth all use this codesystem

resource.name: Patient citizenship status
resource.description: Status of citizenship in NZ

resource.name: Gp-Patient
resource.description: Shows the usual GP for a patient

resource.name: Pr2
resource.description: Practitioner role for test patient 2
